ManSection.Description: Returns The number of i-faces of M.
Returns the number of vertices of M.
Returns the number of edges of M.
Returns the number of facets of M.
Returns the number of ridges ((n-2)-faces) of M.
Returns the f-vector of M.
Returns the section F_j / F_i, where F_j is the j-face of the base flag of M and F_i is the i-face of the base flag.
Returns the section F_j / F_i, where F_j is the j-face of flag number k of M and F_i is the i-face of the same flag.
Returns all sections of type F_j / F_i, where F_j is a j-face and F_i is an incident i-face.
Returns the facet-types of M (i.e. the maniplexes corresponding to the facets).
Returns the facet of M that contains the flag number k (that is, the maniplex corresponding to the facet).
Returns the facet of M that contains flag number 1 (that is, the maniplex corresponding to the facet).
Returns the types of vertex-figures of M (i.e. the maniplexes corresponding to the vertex-figures).
Returns the vertex-figures of M that contains flag number k.
Returns the vertex-figures of M that contains the base flag.

Returns the Schlafli symbol of the maniplex M. Each entry is either an integer or a set of integers, where entry number i shows the polygons that we obtain as sections of (i+1)-faces over (i-2)-faces.

ManSection.Returns: the the maniplex M is equivelar; i.e., whether its Schlafli Symbol consists of integers at each position (no lists).

ManSection.Description: Returns the number of flags of the maniplex M.
Returns the rank of the maniplex M.

Returns whether the polytope P is tight, meaning that it has a Schlafli symbol {k_1, ..., k_{n-1}} and has 2 k_1 ... k_{n-1} flags, which is the minimum possible. This property doesn't make any sense for non-polytopal maniplexes, which aren't constrained by this lower bound.
Returns whether the maniplex M has any sections that are digons. We may eventually want to include maniplexes with even smaller sections.
Returns the Symmetry Type Graph of the maniplex M, encoded as a permutation group on Rank(M) generators.
Returns the number of orbits of the automorphism group of M on its flags.

ManSection.Returns: Whether the maniplex M is reflexible (has one flag orbit).
Whether the maniplex M is chrial.
Whether the maniplex M is rotary; i.e., whether it is either reflexible or chiral.

ManSection.Description: Returns a short name for the maniplex M, if one is available. For example, Description(Simplex(3)) = "3-simplex".

ManSection.Returns: The lengths of j-zigzags of the 3-maniplex M. This corresponds to the lengths of orbits under r0 (r1 r2)^j.
The lengths of all zigzags of the 3-maniplex M. A rank 3 maniplex of type {p, q} has Floor(q/2) distinct zigzag lengths because the j-zigzags are the same as the (q-j)-zigzags.
The length of the petrie polygons of the maniplex M.
